short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remind yourself of epic muddy adventures every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're a member of Mudder Nation then you need this tab extension. Bring back epic memories of muddy adventures, inspiring teamwork and the times when you overcame physical and mental challenges that you never thought you could. Filled with all of your favourite Tough Mudder shortcuts, open a new tab and ask yourself when was the last time you did something for the first time?
